programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar becomes the prime suspect for a series of robberies carried out in his own distinctive style, and sets out to clear his name by catching the copycat crook responsible. His quest takes him to the Cote d'Azur, where he encounters the demure daughter of a wealthy holiday-maker, and before long the two are drawn together. Alfred Hitchcock's Oscar-winning romantic mystery, starring Cary Grant, Grace Kelly and Jessie Royce Landis.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: When a mysterious woman seduces Dominic Toretto into the world of terrorism, the crew faces the biggest trials of their lives. Action sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Charlize Theron and Dwayne Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patient's fractured mind as a 24th character attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalan's thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley.(n)

programme.title: Murder On The Orient Express
programme.desc: When a murder occurs on the train he is travelling on, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case. Mystery, directed by and starring Kenneth Branagh, with Daisy Ridley, Derek Jacobi and Johnny Depp.(n)

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: A CIA agent is accused of being a sleeper assassin with a deadly purpose - to kill the Russian president during a diplomatic visit and start a third world war. She goes on the run, with her colleagues in hot pursuit - but each attempt to prove her innocence only raises more questions about her identity. Action thriller, starring Angelina Jolie, Liev Schreiber and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: xXx: The Return Of Xander Cage
programme.desc: The extreme sports-loving super spy is brought out of exile to retrieve a powerful weapon known as Pandora's Box. Action thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Donnie Yen and Toni Collette.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: When a mysterious woman seduces Dominic Toretto into the world of terrorism, the crew faces the biggest trials of their lives. Action sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Charlize Theron and Dwayne Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Murder On The Orient Express
programme.desc: When a murder occurs on the train he is travelling on, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case. Mystery, directed by and starring Kenneth Branagh, with Daisy Ridley, Derek Jacobi and Johnny Depp.(n)

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: An American teenager travelling through Europe is abducted by a gang of sex traffickers. However, what the kidnappers do not realise is that the girl's father is a former CIA agent, who employs all his old skills as he searches for the criminals and tries to rescue his daughter. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Famke Janssen and Maggie Grace.(n)

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: A CIA agent is accused of being a sleeper assassin with a deadly purpose - to kill the Russian president during a diplomatic visit and start a third world war. She goes on the run, with her colleagues in hot pursuit - but each attempt to prove her innocence only raises more questions about her identity. Action thriller, starring Angelina Jolie, Liev Schreiber and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: Blue Hawaii
programme.desc: A Honolulu resident returns home after two years in the army and defies his parents' wish that he work in the family pineapple business. He has set his heart on carving his own niche and makes a start by taking a job at a tourist agency. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, Angela Lansbury, Joan Blackman and Roland Winters. Songs featured include Can't Help Falling in Love and Rock-a-Hula Baby.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.

programme.title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
programme.desc: A novice witch befriends three children and takes them on a series of magical journeys, including a visit to a land inhabited by cartoon animals, where they get involved in a decidedly one-sided football match against a spoilt lion king. Disney's part-animated musical fantasy, starring Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall and Sam Jaffe.

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: An orphan wins the fatherly affections of a tough-talking billionaire - but the no-good owner of the orphanage and her brother are out to ruin the girl's chances of happiness and make a quick profit in the process. Musical, directed by John Huston, based on the stage play. Starring Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett and Tim Curry.

programme.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
programme.desc: An embittered Victorian miser hates the festive season and people in general, but on Christmas Eve, the ghosts of his former business partners, the Marley brothers, visit him in the night. They warn him three spirits are coming to make him change his ways by showing him visions of the past, the present and what the future may hold. Comedy, with Michael Caine and Steven Mackintosh alongside the puppet characters.

programme.title: The Greatest Showman Sing-A-Long
programme.desc: Against the odds, former bank clerk PT Barnum attempts to create and develop his New York circus in the mid-1800s. Musical drama, starring Hugh Jackman, Rebecca Ferguson, Michelle Williams and Zac Efron.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: A shy English boy joins the senior class at Rydell High and immediately falls for the leader of the Pink Ladies. But she is only interested in tough guys, forcing him to adopt a dual identity as a mysterious biker. Musical sequel, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Maxwell Caulfield, Lorna Luft, Eve Arden and Sid Caesar, with Didi Conn reprising her role as Frenchy from the original film.

programme.title: The Phantom of the Opera
programme.desc: A disfigured composer lurks in the catacombs beneath a Paris opera house, giving rise to stories that the building is haunted. The lonely maestro becomes infatuated with a talented young singer, and plans to turn her into a star. However, his love for her is doomed to end in tragedy. Adaptation of Andrew Lloyd Webber's musical, starring Gerard Butler, Emmy Rossum, Miranda Richardson and Minnie Driver.

programme.title: The Greatest Showman Sing-A-Long
programme.desc: Against the odds, former bank clerk PT Barnum attempts to create and develop his New York circus in the mid-1800s. Musical drama, starring Hugh Jackman, Rebecca Ferguson, Michelle Williams and Zac Efron.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: A shy English boy joins the senior class at Rydell High and immediately falls for the leader of the Pink Ladies. But she is only interested in tough guys, forcing him to adopt a dual identity as a mysterious biker. Musical sequel, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Maxwell Caulfield, Lorna Luft, Eve Arden and Sid Caesar, with Didi Conn reprising her role as Frenchy from the original film.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: Two criminal brothers discover the orphanage where they were raised faces closure unless the nuns who run it can pay their tax bill, so the pair embark on an urgent mission to revive their old blues band to raise the money needed. Comedy, starring John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, Aretha Franklin, James Brown, Ray Charles, Cab Calloway, Carrie Fisher, John Candy and John Lee Hooker.

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: An orphan wins the fatherly affections of a tough-talking billionaire - but the no-good owner of the orphanage and her brother are out to ruin the girl's chances of happiness and make a quick profit in the process. Musical, directed by John Huston, based on the stage play. Starring Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett and Tim Curry.

programme.title: Fun in Acapulco
programme.desc: A former trapeze artist tries to put a work-related tragedy behind him by taking a job as a lifeguard and entertainer in a luxury hotel at the Mexican resort. He ends up contending with the considerable wiles of his beautiful boss and a female matador who each have romantic designs on him. Musical comedy, starring Elvis Presley, Ursula Andress, Paul Lukas and Alejandro Rey.

programme.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
programme.desc: Lounge singers Lorelei and Dorothy embark on a transatlantic cruise to Paris in search of rich husbands. While Dorothy falls for a penniless man, Lorelei thinks she has found the millionaire of her dreams, only for his father to hire a private eye to spy on her and prove she is a gold-digger. Howard Hawks' musical comedy, starring Marilyn Monroe, Jane Russell, Charles Coburn and Elliott Reid.

programme.title: Movie Musical Greats with Hugh Jackman
programme.desc: The actor joins Alex Zane to discuss his career on stage and screen, as well as his favourite movie musicals of all time.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow.

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Two teenagers from rival New York street gangs, the Jets and the Sharks, fall in love - but it causes already simmering tensions to explode. Leonard Bernstein and Stephen Sondheim's Oscar-winning musical based on Romeo and Juliet, adapted from the stage play, starring Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno and George Chakiris.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: A silent-movie star tries to win the heart of an aspiring actress as the introduction of sound changes the film business for ever. However, his frequent on-screen love interest does not take kindly to this real-life romance. Musical comedy, starring Gene Kelly, Debbie Reynolds, Donald O'Connor, Jean Hagen and Millard Mitchell. Songs include Make 'em Laugh, You Are My Lucky Star and the title number.

programme.title: Movie Musical Greats with Hugh Jackman
programme.desc: The actor joins Alex Zane to discuss his career on stage and screen, as well as his favourite movie musicals of all time.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow.

programme.title: Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: An idealistic writer is drawn to the decadent backstreets of Paris, determined to play a part in the bohemian revolution. He falls for a courtesan from the famous Moulin Rouge, but a scheming duke also covets her affections, setting the scene for tragedy. Baz Luhrmann's romantic musical, with Ewan McGregor, Nicole Kidman, Jim Broadbent, Richard Roxburgh and John Leguizamo. Featuring reworkings of pop songs by Nirvana, David Bowie, Elton John and others.

programme.title: Basmati Blues
programme.desc: A scientist is sent to India to sell the genetically modified rice she created, but doesn't realise it will damage the farmers she thinks she's helping. Romantic comedy, starring Brie Larson, Utkarsh Ambudkar and Scott Bakula.(n)

programme.title: Roustabout
programme.desc: A leather-clad drifter with a talent for all things tuneful joins a travelling carnival, and catches the eye of a co-worker - but her father is less less than keen on the relationship, leading to trouble. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, Barbara Stanwyck, Joan Freeman, Leif Erickson and Sue Ann Langdon.(n)

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Two teenagers from rival New York street gangs, the Jets and the Sharks, fall in love - but it causes already simmering tensions to explode. Leonard Bernstein and Stephen Sondheim's Oscar-winning musical based on Romeo and Juliet, adapted from the stage play, starring Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno and George Chakiris.(n)

programme.title: Muppets Most Wanted
programme.desc: The Muppets prepare to head off on a world tour, unaware that Kermit has been replaced by an evil genius who is his exact double. As the dastardly interloper uses the gang's performances as cover for an international crime spree, the real Kermit is left languishing in a Russian prison. Comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Tina Fey and Ty Burrell.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.(n)

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: A silent-movie star tries to win the heart of an aspiring actress as the introduction of sound changes the film business for ever. However, his frequent on-screen love interest does not take kindly to this real-life romance. Musical comedy, starring Gene Kelly, Debbie Reynolds, Donald O'Connor, Jean Hagen and Millard Mitchell. Songs include Make 'em Laugh, You Are My Lucky Star and the title number.(n)

programme.title: The Sound Of Music Sing-A-Long
programme.desc: A cheerful novice nun is employed as governess to the seven children of an austere widower. As she brings light, laughter and a love of all things harmonious to a family previously beset by grief and strict discipline she also falls in love with her employer. But before long, the looming threat of the Second World War jeopardises their happy household. Oscar-winning Rodgers and Hammerstein musical, starring Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer and Eleanor Parker.(n)

programme.title: The Greatest Showman Sing-A-Long
programme.desc: Against the odds, former bank clerk PT Barnum attempts to create and develop his New York circus in the mid-1800s. Musical drama, starring Hugh Jackman, Rebecca Ferguson, Michelle Williams and Zac Efron.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect Sing-Along
programme.desc: A new student finds herself a social outcast during her first year of college, but soon acquires a new circle of friends in a band of misfits with a shared talent for singing. She joins their a cappella group and leads them to compete in the campus music competitions. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Elizabeth Banks.(n)

programme.title: Grease Sing-A-Long
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.(n)

programme.title: The Greatest Showman Sing-A-Long
programme.desc: Against the odds, former bank clerk PT Barnum attempts to create and develop his New York circus in the mid-1800s. Musical drama, starring Hugh Jackman, Rebecca Ferguson, Michelle Williams and Zac Efron.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect Sing-Along
programme.desc: A new student finds herself a social outcast during her first year of college, but soon acquires a new circle of friends in a band of misfits with a shared talent for singing. She joins their a cappella group and leads them to compete in the campus music competitions. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Elizabeth Banks.(n)

programme.title: Slow West
programme.desc: A Scottish teenager travels to America at the end of the 19th century. He travels across the frontier in the hope of being reunited with the woman he loves, aided in his travels by a mysterious drifter and stalked through the wilderness by an outlaw. Western, starring Kodi Smit-McPhee and Michael Fassbender.

programme.title: Rec 3: Genesis
programme.desc: A couple's wedding day takes a grim turn when some of the guests display signs of a strange illness. They are soon falling prey to a disease that turns people into bloodthirsty maniacs. In the ensuing carnage, the bride and groom are separated and face a desperate struggle to find each other. Horror sequel, starring Leticia Dolera and Diego Martin. In Spanish and Catalan.

programme.title: Ponyo
programme.desc: A fish falls in love with a boy, so uses magic to turn herself into a human girl. However, her meddling with sorcery throws the balance of the natural world into upheaval, and the two children race against time to undo the damage while finding a way to let her remain in her new form. Hayao Miyazaki's animated fantasy, with the voices of Noah Lindsey Cyrus, Frankie Jonas, Cate Blanchett and Liam Neeson.

programme.title: Night at the Museum
programme.desc: A new nightwatchman at New York's Museum of Natural History discovers his job entails more than he bargained for. Once night falls, an ancient Egyptian spell brings the museum exhibits to life, entangling him in a riotous struggle to restore peace and order before the sun rises and visitors arrive. Fantasy comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Dick Van Dyke, Robin Williams, Carla Gugino and Ricky Gervais.

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A rodeo rider and a college student fall in love, but begin to question whether they have a future together as their dreams lead them in different directions. They form an unexpected friendship with an old man, whose decades-long tale of love provides them with fresh inspiration. Romantic drama based on the novel by Nicholas Sparks, starring Britt Robertson, Scott Eastwood and Alan Alda.

programme.title: Bohemian Rhapsody Interview Special
programme.desc: Rami Malek discusses playing Freddie Mercury in the biopic about the rise of the rock band.

programme.title: Exodus: Gods and Kings
programme.desc: Moses, the adoptive brother of the pharaoh of Egypt, is sent into exile, where he receives a message from God demanding he set all the country's slaves free. When his brother refuses to comply, the kingdom is struck by a series of devastating plagues. Biblical epic, starring Christian Bale, Joel Edgerton, Sigourney Weaver and John Turturro.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. He discovers that she has been targetted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Action thriller sequel based on Lee Child's novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders and Danika Yarosh.

programme.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
programme.desc: An old man tells a journalist the story of his youth as a lobby boy at a hotel in Eastern Europe in the 1930s. He was taken under the wing of the establishment's dashing concierge, and is drawn into his misadventures as he becomes involved in a conflict over a valuable painting. Wes Anderson's comedy drama, starring Ralph Fiennes, Tony Revolori, F Murray Abraham and Jude Law.

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A teenager in 1960s London is unhappy with his lot in life, but believes he has found a place to belong in the mod subculture and their feud with the rival rockers. As the mods gather in Brighton for a weekend that turns to violence, his naive vision of the world is cruelly shattered. Drama based on the Who album, starring Phil Daniels, Leslie Ash, Sting and Ray Winstone.

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.desc: A bittersweet modern day fairytale where three deaf women, Veronica, Karen and Sally face three very different Christmases until an unexpected event throws them together.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of John Leguizamo, Ray Romano, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic and Jack Black.

programme.title: Eragon
programme.desc: A young farm boy discovers a dragon's egg, which hatches into the last surviving specimen of its mighty race. His friendship with the winged creature soon comes in handy when he discovers he is destined to overthrow the evil tyrant who has taken control of the kingdom. Fantasy adventure, starring Ed Speleers, Jeremy Irons, Robert Carlyle and Sienna Guillory, with Rachel Weisz providing the voice of the dragon.

programme.title: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: A chosen one with mastery of the four elements is charged with keeping the peace between four nations. When he disappears while still a boy, one of these factions sees a chance to gain absolute power and wages war on the others. After 100 years, the chosen one is found and must find a way to restore harmony. Fantasy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Noah Ringer and Dev Patel.

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: A workaholic father tries to make up for his perpetual absence from home by promising to buy his son a hugely popular action figure for Christmas - little realising every other father in town has the same idea. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sinbad, Jake Lloyd, Rita Wilson, Robert Conrad and Phil Hartman.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about the making of the Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: A woman has a chance encounter with a rogue secret agent, who has been framed as a traitor and is on the run from his own superiors. Realising she is in danger for knowing too much, he kidnaps her and drags her along on his desperate mission to clear his name. Comedy adventure, with Tom Cruise and Cameron Diaz.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A streetwise teenager is taken under the wing of his dead father's old colleague, an agent working for a super-secret spy organisation. Will the youngster prove to be a chip off the old block by proving useful during a battle against a twisted, hi-tech genius? Action comedy based on a comic book, starring Colin Firth, Taron Egerton and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: Two estranged brothers are drawn to enter a mixed martial arts tournament, one a military veteran looking for a way to escape his troubled past, the other a struggling teacher who needs the prize money to support his family. As they progress through the contest, both emerge as likely winners - putting them on course to face each other in the final. Drama, with Joel Edgerton, Tom Hardy and Nick Nolte.

programme.title: Top Secret
programme.desc: A rock 'n' roll singer goes on tour in East Germany in the 1950s, where a scientist's daughter draws him into the world of international espionage through a French underground movement seeking to foil a Nazi plan to take over the world. Comedy, spoofing Second World War spy thrillers and Elvis movies, starring Val Kilmer, Lucy Gutteridge and Omar Sharif.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: A cataclysm leaves prehistoric animals Manny, Sid and Diego lost at sea on a drifting iceberg. They try to find a way to return home, embarking on a journey that leads to an encounter with a ferocious band of piratical creatures. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary and Peter Dinklage.(n)

programme.title: My Neighbour Totoro
programme.desc: Two sisters move to a new home in the countryside when their mother is taken ill. They are thrilled to discover the house is next to an enchanted forest, and befriending the eldest and wisest of the strange magical creatures dwelling there. Animated fantasy from Spirited Away director Hayao Miyazaki, with the voices of Dakota and Elle Fanning.(n)

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: A minor-league ice hockey player is nicknamed the Tooth Fairy for knocking opponents' teeth out on the ice. When the cynical athlete discourages a young fan, he is forced to pay penance by spending a week as the real Tooth Fairy, rediscovering his dreams in the process. Family comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Ashley Judd, Stephen Merchant, Ryan Sheckler and Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte.(n)

programme.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
programme.desc: A puny but brave volunteer is rejected for military service during the Second World War. He becomes the test subject for an experiment that transforms him into the ultimate soldier, and battles against a secret Nazi society plotting to harness the powers of a mystical artefact. Superhero adventure, with Chris Evans, Hugo Weaving, Hayley Atwell and Tommy Lee Jones.(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Secret agent Ethan Hunt and his team are implicated in a bombing at the Kremlin, forcing the American president to declare them fugitives. The spies plan to clear their name by abducting the real terrorist, which leads them into a pursuit around the globe. However, Hunt cannot be sure his colleagues are trustworthy. Action adventure sequel, starring Tom Cruise, Jeremy Renner, Simon Pegg and Paula Patton.(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: An ordinary soldier is chosen to take part in a secret scientific experiment in which he and a prostitute will be placed in hibernation for one year. However, the plan goes awry and the two guinea pigs awake to find themselves in the year 2505, where they are the most intelligent people in the world and must battle to save the human race from its own stupidity. Sci-fi comedy, with Luke Wilson, Maya Rudolph and Dax Shepard.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Do-Over
programme.desc: An irresponsible father and ex-husband is forced to live Christmas Day over and over again until he learns to make amends for his past failings. Although his initial reaction is to revert to his childish behaviour, he gradually comes to realise that the only way to escape the repetitive nightmare is to treat his son and former wife with the respect they deserve. Family comedy, with Jay Mohr and Daphne Zuniga.

programme.title: Christmas Angel
programme.desc: A woman searching for a job at Christmas time is helped by a neighbour, who offers her a job to work as his assistant. Comedy drama, starring Kari Hawker and Bruce Davison.

programme.title: Mr St Nick
programme.desc: Father Christmas decides it is time to hang up his hat and hand the reins of the family business over to his son - who is less than enthusiastic about donning the famed red suit, preferring to spend his time on Miami Beach, throwing the future of the festive season into doubt. Festive comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, Charles Durning and Elaine Hendrix.

programme.title: Cancel Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus discovers that Christmas is in danger of being cancelled because children are too greedy. He decides to prove otherwise, adopting a disguise and visiting two kids and teaching them about the importance of charity. Fantasy, starring Judd Nelson, Justin Landry, Natalie Brown and John Fleming.

programme.title: The March Sisters at Christmas
programme.desc: Four sisters are shocked to learn their family home will have to be sold because of the the massive amount of repair work it needs. When their parents go away, the girls come up with a plan to restore the place themselves and have it back to its former glory by Christmas. Drama inspired by Louisa May Alcott's Little Women, starring Julie Marie Berman, Kaitlin Doubleday, Melissa Farman and Molly Kunz.

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.

programme.title: The March Sisters at Christmas
programme.desc: Four sisters are shocked to learn their family home will have to be sold because of the the massive amount of repair work it needs. When their parents go away, the girls come up with a plan to restore the place themselves and have it back to its former glory by Christmas. Drama inspired by Louisa May Alcott's Little Women, starring Julie Marie Berman, Kaitlin Doubleday, Melissa Farman and Molly Kunz.

programme.title: Christmas Caper
programme.desc: A thief heads back to her hometown in Connecticut to lay low after a con goes wrong, but gets stuck babysitting her niece and nephew. The bitter crook spends her time devising ways to get even with her partner in crime - until the Christmas spirit begins to transform her. Comedy, starring Shannen Doherty and Stefanie von Pfetten.

programme.title: Santa and Pete
programme.desc: A widower worries about facing his first Christmas since his wife died, but finds comfort in telling his 10-year-old grandson a traditional Dutch tale about Father Christmas's amazing travels, including an occasion when the jolly old fellow needed help from a kindly cook. Children's fantasy, starring James Earl Jones, Hume Cronyn, Flex Alexander, Tempestt Bledsoe, Emily Mae Young and Sedrathe Gillespie.

programme.title: Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: A road closure leaves eight strangers dealing with personal issues in their lives stranded together in an abandoned church during a snowstorm. They gradually learn to put their differences aside and find ways to help each other with the problems troubling them. Drama, starring Allison Hossack and Aaron Pearl.

programme.title: The Case for Christmas
programme.desc: A greedy business mogul is still bitter about not receiving the presents he wanted as a child, so decides to sue Santa Claus. Needing legal representation, the jolly old man turns to a lawyer desperately trying to balance his career and his responsibilities as a father. Festive comedy, starring Dean Cain, Rachel Blanchard and George Buza.

programme.title: The Night Before the Night Before Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus sets off on his deliveries a day early, but crashes his sleigh into a house, loses his magic bag of toys and ends up with amnesia. The dysfunctional family that lives there must learn to work together for a change if they are to save Christmas. Fantasy, starring Jennifer Beals and Rick Roberts.

programme.title: My Santa
programme.desc: A disillusioned single mother regains her festive spirit when she and her son befriend a shopping mall Santa. They do not realise that he is the son of the real Father Christmas who is training to take over the family business - but before he can do so, he needs to find a wife. Drama, starring Samaire Armstrong and Matthew Lawrence.

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.

programme.title: My Santa
programme.desc: A disillusioned single mother regains her festive spirit when she and her son befriend a shopping mall Santa. They do not realise that he is the son of the real Father Christmas who is training to take over the family business - but before he can do so, he needs to find a wife. Drama, starring Samaire Armstrong and Matthew Lawrence.

programme.title: Single Santa Seeks Mrs Claus
programme.desc: The son of a hard-working single mother writes a letter to Father Christmas asking for a new dad. By coincidence, Santa is poised to hand over his global toy-distributing duties to his son Nick - who will only be able to take over the family business when he finds himself a wife. Comedy, starring Crystal Bernard, Steve Guttenberg, Dominic Scott Kay and Cody Arens.

programme.title: Our First Christmas
programme.desc: A newlywed couple with children from previous marriages long to spend their first Christmas together as one big, happy family. However, the two different sets of siblings are set in their ways and refuse to surrender their customary yuletide traditions. Drama, starring Julie Warner, Steven Eckholdt, Katerina Graham, Dixie Carter and Carly Bondar.

programme.title: Santa Baby
programme.desc: Santa Claus' rebellious daughter leaves the North Pole to become a successful businesswoman. Years later, she receives news that her father has fallen ill and needs her to take over organising Christmas - but she gets carried away trying to make the workshop more efficient. Festive comedy, with Jenny McCarthy and George Wendt.

programme.title: Christmas Do-Over
programme.desc: An irresponsible father and ex-husband is forced to live Christmas Day over and over again until he learns to make amends for his past failings. Although his initial reaction is to revert to his childish behaviour, he gradually comes to realise that the only way to escape the repetitive nightmare is to treat his son and former wife with the respect they deserve. Family comedy, with Jay Mohr and Daphne Zuniga.

programme.title: Single Santa Seeks Mrs Claus
programme.desc: The son of a hard-working single mother writes a letter to Father Christmas asking for a new dad. By coincidence, Santa is poised to hand over his global toy-distributing duties to his son Nick - who will only be able to take over the family business when he finds himself a wife. Comedy, starring Crystal Bernard, Steve Guttenberg, Dominic Scott Kay and Cody Arens.

programme.title: A Christmas Wedding Date
programme.desc: A woman returns to her home town after 10 years away to attend a wedding, and ends up magically reliving the day over and over again. The experience gives her a chance to see a different side to the people she has rejected to further her career, and she rebuilds bridges with her mother and her high-school boyfriend. Comedy, with Marla Sokoloff and Chris Carmack.

programme.title: My Dad Is Scrooge
programme.desc: A boy is shocked when his grouchy father gives a farmer a foreclosure notice just before Christmas. He wakes up one night to discover the farmyard animals in his room, who reveal they can talk and offer to help him play a trick that will teach his dad the importance of Christmas spirit. Festive fantasy, starring Brian Cook and Christian Laurian Kerr.

programme.title: Mr St Nick
programme.desc: Father Christmas decides it is time to hang up his hat and hand the reins of the family business over to his son - who is less than enthusiastic about donning the famed red suit, preferring to spend his time on Miami Beach, throwing the future of the festive season into doubt. Festive comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, Charles Durning and Elaine Hendrix.

programme.title: Cancel Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus discovers that Christmas is in danger of being cancelled because children are too greedy. He decides to prove otherwise, adopting a disguise and visiting two kids and teaching them about the importance of charity. Fantasy, starring Judd Nelson, Justin Landry, Natalie Brown and John Fleming.

programme.title: Christmas Caper
programme.desc: A thief heads back to her hometown in Connecticut to lay low after a con goes wrong, but gets stuck babysitting her niece and nephew. The bitter crook spends her time devising ways to get even with her partner in crime - until the Christmas spirit begins to transform her. Comedy, starring Shannen Doherty and Stefanie von Pfetten.

programme.title: Santa and Pete
programme.desc: A widower worries about facing his first Christmas since his wife died, but finds comfort in telling his 10-year-old grandson a traditional Dutch tale about Father Christmas's amazing travels, including an occasion when the jolly old fellow needed help from a kindly cook. Children's fantasy, starring James Earl Jones, Hume Cronyn, Flex Alexander, Tempestt Bledsoe, Emily Mae Young and Sedrathe Gillespie.

programme.title: Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: A road closure leaves eight strangers dealing with personal issues in their lives stranded together in an abandoned church during a snowstorm. They gradually learn to put their differences aside and find ways to help each other with the problems troubling them. Drama, starring Allison Hossack and Aaron Pearl.

programme.title: The Case for Christmas
programme.desc: A greedy business mogul is still bitter about not receiving the presents he wanted as a child, so decides to sue Santa Claus. Needing legal representation, the jolly old man turns to a lawyer desperately trying to balance his career and his responsibilities as a father. Festive comedy, starring Dean Cain, Rachel Blanchard and George Buza.

programme.title: The Night Before the Night Before Christmas
programme.desc: Santa Claus sets off on his deliveries a day early, but crashes his sleigh into a house, loses his magic bag of toys and ends up with amnesia. The dysfunctional family that lives there must learn to work together for a change if they are to save Christmas. Fantasy, starring Jennifer Beals and Rick Roberts.

programme.title: My Santa
programme.desc: A disillusioned single mother regains her festive spirit when she and her son befriend a shopping mall Santa. They do not realise that he is the son of the real Father Christmas who is training to take over the family business - but before he can do so, he needs to find a wife. Drama, starring Samaire Armstrong and Matthew Lawrence.

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: On the day of the escape, Matt and Sweat know the smallest mistake can derail their whole plan. But when a stern corrections officer takes over the post in the tailor shop and fellow inmate Murder gets out of the Special Housing Unit, Matt seems attracted to the danger. Tilly and Lyle have a fateful dinner at an all-you-can-eat Chinese restaurant.

programme.title: Spotlight
programme.desc: A team of investigative journalists in Boston shocks the city and the world by exposing the Catholic Church's systematic cover-up of widespread child molestation perpetrated by more than 70 local priests.

programme.title: Patriots Day
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombing, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders (Mark Wahlberg) joins courageous survivors, first responders and investigators in a race against the clock to hunt down the bombers before they strike again. The stories of Special Agent Richard Deslauriers (Kevin Bacon), Police Commissioner Ed Davis (John Goodman), Sergeant Jeffrey Pugliese (J.K. Simmons) and nurse Carol Saunders (Michelle Monaghan) are all woven together to show the strength of the city.

programme.title: American Dream / American Knightmare
programme.desc: Documentary that delves deep into the life and storied exploits of the iconic Death Row Records co-founder Suge Knight, as well as the volatile and highly influential era in gangsta rap he presided over. Through a series of interviewers face to face with director Antoine Fuqua, Knight reveals exactly how it all happened and why it all fell apart. Knight is currently in jail pending trial on murder, attempted-murder and hit-and-run charges.

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: On the day of the escape, Matt and Sweat know the smallest mistake can derail their whole plan. But when a stern corrections officer takes over the post in the tailor shop and fellow inmate Murder gets out of the Special Housing Unit, Matt seems attracted to the danger. Tilly and Lyle have a fateful dinner at an all-you-can-eat Chinese restaurant.(c)

programme.title: Who Once Was Dead
programme.desc: Ray works to make things right with Sam, but she has her own ideas about controlling damage. Bunchy comes back to New York with some missing goods. Terry spends the night with someone from his past. Bridget pays the price for her father’s actions.(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Violence, Brief Nudity

programme.title: 48 Hrs.
programme.desc: A streetwise convict (Eddie Murphy) teams up with a cantankerous cop (Nick Nolte) to track down two cold-blooded killers.

programme.title: Backdraft
programme.desc: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

programme.title: 2018 Week 15
programme.desc: This week on INSIDE THE NFL: are the Los Angeles Chargers the team to beat in the AFC and is this the beginning of the end for Bill Belichick, Tom Brady and the New England Patriots? Also, predictions for which teams will be playing in the postseason.(c)

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians puts together a purposely-horrible team so they'll lose and she can move the team. But when the plot is uncovered, they start winning just to spite her.

programme.title: Meet the Fockers
programme.desc: Ben Stiller is back as Gaylord "Greg" Focker, the unlucky fiancé who must endure another humiliating parental exchange. Having given him their daughter's hand, Jack and Dina Byrnes (Oscar® winner Robert De Niro and Blythe Danner) now travel to Florida to meet Greg's parents - a couple who couldn't be more different from the ex-CIA agent and his wife. Oscar® winners Dustin Hoffman and Barbra Streisand co-star as the eccentric Fockers.

programme.title: A Bad Moms Christmas
programme.desc: Three under-appreciated and over-burdened women rebel against the challenges and expectations of the Super Bowl for moms: Christmas. And if creating a more perfect holiday for their families wasn't hard enough, they have to do all of that while hosting and entertaining their own mothers.

programme.title: Rising
programme.desc: A Muslim family and their diverse neighbors struggle to survive rising floodwaters and bias in the heart of America.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Having lost his memory and the one person he loved, Jason Bourne is forced to hunt down his past in order to find a future. Traveling from Moscow, Paris and London to Tangier and New York City, he continues his quest to find the real Jason Bourne - all the while trying to outmaneuver the scores of cops, federal officers and Interpol agents who have him in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Who Once Was Dead
programme.desc: Ray works to make things right with Sam, but she has her own ideas about controlling damage. Bunchy comes back to New York with some missing goods. Terry spends the night with someone from his past. Bridget pays the price for her father’s actions.(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Violence, Brief Nudity

programme.title: American Assassin
programme.desc: The story of the rise of Mitch Rapp (Dylan O'Brien), a CIA black ops recruit under the instruction of Cold War veteran Stan Hurley (Michael Keaton). The pair is enlisted by CIA Deputy Director Irene Kennedy (Sanaa Lathan) to investigate a wave of apparently random attacks on both military and civilian targets. Together the three discover a pattern in the violence leading them to a joint mission with a lethal Turkish agent (Shiva Negar) to stop a mysterious operative (Taylor Kitsch) intent on starting a World War.

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: On the day of the escape, Matt and Sweat know the smallest mistake can derail their whole plan. But when a stern corrections officer takes over the post in the tailor shop and fellow inmate Murder gets out of the Special Housing Unit, Matt seems attracted to the danger. Tilly and Lyle have a fateful dinner at an all-you-can-eat Chinese restaurant.(c)

programme.title: Dream On
programme.desc: Ray struggles to get the help he so desperately needs, causing Bridget to learn some hard truths about her father. Ray makes a move to save both Novak’s campaign and Mac’s life. Mickey sees an opportunity to recoup some of his losses. Darryl and Sandy find common ground.(c)

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: In a deep dive into the minds of these individuals, we finally see what Matt and Sweat are capable of outside the prison walls. Tilly’s natural instincts aren’t much better.(c)

programme.title: Dream On
programme.desc: Ray struggles to get the help he so desperately needs, causing Bridget to learn some hard truths about her father. Ray makes a move to save both Novak’s campaign and Mac’s life. Mickey sees an opportunity to recoup some of his losses. Darryl and Sandy find common ground.(c)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Having lost his memory and the one person he loved, Jason Bourne is forced to hunt down his past in order to find a future. Traveling from Moscow, Paris and London to Tangier and New York City, he continues his quest to find the real Jason Bourne - all the while trying to outmaneuver the scores of cops, federal officers and Interpol agents who have him in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Korn's Brian "Head" Welch: Loud Krazy Love
programme.desc: Documentary exploring how the sound Brian "Head" Welch pioneered with KoRn in the early ‘90s provided identity to a generation of misfits and made him a global rock star. However, Brian's life takes a turn when he walks out on a $23M record deal in order to become a good father to his daughter.(c)

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: A talented young getaway driver (Ansel Elgort) relies on the beat of his personal soundtrack to be the best in the game. When he meets the girl of his dreams (Lily James), Baby sees a chance to ditch his criminal life and make a clean getaway. But after being coerced into working for a crime boss (Kevin Spacey), he must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Madea's Family Reunion
programme.desc: Writer, director and star Tyler Perry returns to his signature role in this comedy-drama that finds family matriarch Madea juggling several romantic crises involving her nieces' relationships as well as the funeral of an older sister - all on the weekend that her entire clan is gathering for a reunion. Cicely Tyson, Blair Underwood, Lynn Whitfield and Maya Angelou costar.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Just when he's needed most, wily pirate Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp) is trapped on a sea of sand in Davy Jones' Locker. In an increasingly shaky alliance, Will Turner (Orlando Bloom), Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) and Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) begin a desperate quest to find and rescue him. Captain Jack's the last of the nine Pirate Lords of the Brethren Court who must come together united in one last stand to preserve the freedom-loving pirates' way of life.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: A squadron of vengeful, Nazi-killing Allied soldiers becomes embroiled in a plot to firebomb a Parisian movie theater hosting a film premiere that Adolf Hitler plans to attend in this comically violent World War II action smash starring Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger and Oscar® winner Christoph Waltz.

programme.title: The Death of Stalin
programme.desc: In the days following Stalin's collapse, his core team of ministers tussle for control; some want positive change in the Soviet Union, others have more sinister motives. Their one common trait? They're all just desperately trying to remain alive. The internal political landscape of 1950's Soviet Russia takes on darkly comic form in a new film courtesy of Emmy® award winning and Oscar® nominated writer/director Armando Iannucci.

programme.title: Dream On
programme.desc: Ray struggles to get the help he so desperately needs, causing Bridget to learn some hard truths about her father. Ray makes a move to save both Novak’s campaign and Mac’s life. Mickey sees an opportunity to recoup some of his losses. Darryl and Sandy find common ground.(c)

programme.title: Quantum of Solace
programme.desc: Daniel Craig returns as British secret agent James Bond in this sequel that finds the dapper, lethal spy pursuing the villains behind the death of his murdered lover and uncovering a sinister global organization bent on world domination. Olga Kurylenko and Mathieu Amalric costar in this dazzling follow-up.(n)

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: In a deep dive into the minds of these individuals, we finally see what Matt and Sweat are capable of outside the prison walls. Tilly’s natural instincts aren’t much better.(n)
