Their shared Armenian heritage sparks an attraction that turns into a romantic rivalry between Michael and Ana's boyfriend (Christian Bale), an American photojournalist. As the Ottoman Empire crumbles into war-torn chaos, their conflicting passions must be put aside as they join forces to get themselves to safety.

programme.title: Prom Night
programme.desc: Donna's senior prom is supposed to be the best night of her life. After surviving a horrible tragedy, she has finally moved on and is enjoying her last year of high school. Surrounded by her best friends, she should be safe from the horrors of her past. But when the night turns deadly, there is only one person who could be responsible - a man she thought was gone forever. Now, Donna and her friends must find a way to escape the sadistic rampage of an obsessed killer, and survive a night "to die for.".

programme.title: Liquid Heat
programme.desc: A heat wave causes temperatures to rise between Bette and Tina, who are trapped in an elevator by a power outage, and between Molly and Shane, whose attraction is discouraged by Phyllis; Jenny catches costars Nikki and Greg together.(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Strong Sexual Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Lifecycle
programme.desc: A memorial breast cancer bike ride becomes the unlikely setting where Bette and Tina reveal their rekindled passion, Jenny and Nikki shoot a steamy video, Molly stalks Shane, and Alice and Tasha consider a major move.(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Strong Sexual Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Lunar Cycle
programme.desc: The enigmatic and mysterious Adele finally makes a power play and usurps Jenny as the director of "Lez Girls," while Bette finalizes her breakup with Jodi, and a distressed Kit loses financial control of The Planet to Dawn and Cindi.(n)

programme.title: Loyal And True
programme.desc: In the Season Five finale, Shane predictably pulls away from Molly when the relationship becomes serious; restored as heiress to her family fortune, Helena uses her wealth creatively; Jenny's film is complete but she is betrayed by a close friend.(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: Bridget's focus on single life and her career is interrupted when she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch ... she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.(n)

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: Loretta Castorini (Cher), a 37-year-old widow who still lives at home, falls in love with her timid fiance's (Danny Aiello) brother (Nicolas Cage), a hot-headed and passionate baker with a love of opera and life.(n)

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).(n)

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: Amanda Seyfried ('Red Riding Hood') stars in this intense thriller about a desperate young woman who, after being ignored by the police, is forced to go on the hunt alone for a maniacal serial killer whom she believes has kidnapped her younger sister.(n)

programme.title: American Graffiti
programme.desc: Coming of age classic, directed by George Lucas, following four teenagers in the early 60s on their last summer night before college, as they explore drag racing, romance, drive ins and experience America's last age of innocence. Stars Harrison Ford, Richard Dreyfuss and Ron Howard.(n)

programme.title: It's Me, Sugar
programme.desc: A recounting of the making of ‘Some Like It Hot' starring Marilyn Monroe and directed by Billy Wilder - now regarded as one of the great comedies in the history of cinema. During filming, Marilyn was required to knock on a hotel room door and say the line: ‘It's me. Sugar.' With Wilder; her co-stars, Tony Curtis and Jack Lemmon, and her husband, Arthur Miller, looking on, Marilyn finally nails the line - e…after 47 takes.(n)

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.(n)

programme.title: The Debt
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Helen Mirren and Sam Worthington star in the story of Rachel Singer (Mirren), a former Mossad agent who endeavored to capture and bring to trial a notorious Nazi war criminal in a secret Israeli mission that ended with his death on the streets of East Berlin. Now, 30 years later, a man claiming to be the doctor has surfaced, and Rachel must go back to Eastern Europe to uncover the truth. Directed by Academy Award nominee John Madden.(n)

programme.title: Anything
programme.desc: Grief-stricken over the recent death of his wife, Early Landry (John Carroll Lynch) moves from Mississippi to Los Angeles and despite the objections of his overprotective sister (Maura Tierney), into a run-down apartment complex in Hollywood. He is a welcome presence in his new environment, and quickly finds himself in an intense friendship with his neighbor Freda (Matt Bomer), but the simplicity of their shared loneliness and growing affection must be reconciled with the complexity of their disparate backgrounds.(n)

programme.title: Long Night's Journey Into Day
programme.desc: In the Season 6 premiere, a shocking revelation about the fate of a major character leads to a season-long series of flashbacks that will reveal the events leading up to the tragedy.(n)

programme.title: Least Likely
programme.desc: Bette and Tina discuss plans for a new life together, but the reappearance of an old acquaintance of Bette's threatens their future; Tasha and Alice seek counseling for their compatibility issues; an old flame sends Helena reeling.(n)

programme.title: LMFAO
programme.desc: The negative of Jenny's movie goes missing, while Shane's apologies to her are finally noticed; Jenny dismisses Alice's aspiration to write a screenplay; Phyllis shares a secret with Bette; Kit and Helena open a new nightclub.(n)

programme.title: Leaving Los Angeles
programme.desc: Shane and Jenny are still melting over each other; Bette and Tina meet a potential birth mother; Max tries to deal with being pregnant; Alice and Tasha play matchmaker; and Kelly Wentworth (Elizabeth Berkley) may have what Bette needs.(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Litmus Test
programme.desc: Jenny writes another script that sells; Bette and Kelly go into business; Alice and Tasha have a third-wheel crush; the girls plot a sting operation to test Dylan; Jenny encroaches further on Shane.(n)

programme.title: Remember the Night
programme.desc: A woman is arrested for shoplifting. As they await her trial, the cop who arrests her takes her home to his family for Christmas, where the loving atmosphere changes her outlook and they begin to fall in love. (cc).

programme.title: Christmas in Connecticut
programme.desc: The columnist for a national housekeeping magazine, as part of a promotional stunt, welcomes a returning war hero into her country estate, the only problem is she's a klutz in the kitchen, where she's never been at home on the range. (cc).

programme.title: Beware, My Lovely
programme.desc: A widow's impulsive decision to hire a handyman has deadly results when it is discovered he is mentally unstable and extremely paranoid, and soon targets his destructive behavior at her. (cc).

programme.title: Period of Adjustment
programme.desc: An exploration of the problems facing newlyweds who tied the knot on a whim, and an older married couple, the husband of whom got hitched because he stood to inherit his father-in-law's business. An adaptation of a Tennessee Williams play. (cc).

programme.title: Carol for Another Christmas
programme.desc: Updating of Charles Dickens' "A Christmas Carol" tells the tale of a melancholy father mourning the son he lost in World War II, until his holiday grieving is interrupted by visits from the ghosts of Christmases past, present and future. (cc).

programme.title: MGM Parade Show
programme.desc: (cc).

programme.title: Scrooge
programme.desc: Adaptation of the classic Charles Dickens novel "A Christmas Carol," about a heartless miser who discovers the true meaning of the holiday when three ghosts visit him on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: A Night at the Movies
programme.desc: A look at holiday-themed motion pictures, such as "Miracle on 34th Street," "It's a Wonderful Life" and "A Christmas Carol." Included: behind-the-scenes info and interviews with Chevy Chase, Margaret O'Brien, Chaz Palminteri, Zack Ward and Brian Henson.

programme.title: Bush Christmas
programme.desc: In Australia, four children riding home during the holidays run afoul of rustlers and set off for the mountains to retrieve the stolen horses.

programme.title: Beware, My Lovely
programme.desc: A widow's impulsive decision to hire a handyman has deadly results when it is discovered he is mentally unstable and extremely paranoid, and soon targets his destructive behavior at her. (cc).

programme.title: O. Henry's Full House
programme.desc: A series of five short segments enact favorite stories from author O. Henry, most notably The Cop and the Anthem. (cc).

programme.title: Susan Slept Here
programme.desc: A Hollywood screenwriter working on a script about juvenile delinquents takes in a female teenage troublemaker to help with his research, and has to deal with a fiancée who thinks that the relationship is more than platonic. The film's opening narration is provided by an Oscar statuette. This was actor-singer Dick Powell's final big-screen appearance. (cc).

programme.title: All Mine to Give
programme.desc: After her husband dies, an immigrant wife takes on the responsibility of raising their six children on the Wisconsin frontier, circa 1865, but when she takes ill and passes on, it falls to her young son to find homes for his siblings. (cc).

programme.title: Holiday Inn
programme.desc: A country roadhouse in Connecticut is turned into a nightclub 15 times a year in this stylish and snappy Bing Crosby-Fred Astaire musical that introduced "White Christmas," which won an Oscar for Best Song. The Oscar-nominated soundtrack features a wealth of Irving Berlin tunes including "Easter Parade" and "Happy Holiday." The Holiday Inn hotel chain took its name from the film's title. (cc).

programme.title: The Holly and the Ivy
programme.desc: Home for Christmas, a parson (Ralph Richardson) and his family face their hopes and regrets. Jenny: Celia Johnson. Margaret: Margaret Leighton. Mick: Denholm Elliott. David: John Gregson. Richard: Hugh Williams. Lydia: Margaret Halstan. Bridget: Maureen Delaney. Directed by George More O'Ferrall.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A first-rate adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic novel about Ebenezer Scrooge, a London miser who, despite his wealth, refuses to make charitable contributions and treats his sole employee, Bob Cratchit, as an indentured servant. On Christmas Eve, Scrooge is visited by the ghost of his selfish business partner, Jacob Marley, and then by three more spirits that same night, an experience that forever changes his life. (cc).

programme.title: The King of Kings
programme.desc: Cecil B. DeMille's silent Biblical epic about the life of Christ adheres faithfully to the particulars of Jesus' life, betrayal, trial, Crucifixion (which is followed by a spectacular storm) and Resurrection (which was shot in vivid Technicolor).

programme.title: Fanny and Alexander
programme.desc: Ingmar Bergman's Oscar-winning study of life in a family, as seen through the eyes of two children (Pernilla Allwin, Bertil Guve) in 1907 Sweden. Helena: Gunn Wallgren. Lydia: Christina Schollin. Oscar: Allan Edwall. Carl: Borje Ahlstedt. Other Oscars include Best Cinematography and Costumes.

programme.title: Beyond Tomorrow
programme.desc: The spirits of three dead bachelors killed in an airplane crash try to help a couple find happiness after setting the pair up while they were still alive.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Four sisters come of age during the American Civil War under the guidance of their mother, as their father is absent, ministering to the troops.

programme.title: The Great Rupert
programme.desc: A family of poor acrobats are thrilled when they find a stash of cash hidden in their house during the Great Depression. When the father is accused of robbing their rich neighbor, the real culprit is discovered: a feisty squirrel named Rupert. (cc).

programme.title: Babes in Toyland
programme.desc: Two bumbling apprentices to the master toymaker of Toyland try to raise money to help Little Bo-Peep and her sweetheart Tom-Tom. (cc).

programme.title: The Shop Around the Corner
programme.desc: Two coworkers at a Budapest gift shop unknowingly correspond with each other, having "met" through a lonely-hearts ad, but as the pen pals grow closer on paper, their at-work bickering drives them further apart. Remade in 1949 as the musical "In the Good Old Summertime" and updated and reworked as "You've Got Mail" in 1998. (cc).

programme.title: Holiday Affair
programme.desc: A department-store clerk meets a war widow who's shopping at Christmastime and romance ensues, much to the displeasure of her stuffed-shirt attorney boyfriend. (cc).

programme.title: Christmas in Connecticut

programme.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
programme.desc: Americana tunefest set against the backdrop of the impending 1904 World's Fair in St. Louis, as a family learn their father's business is transferring him to New York City, and his four daughters argue that they don't want to move. Songs include "The Boy Next Door," "The Trolley Song" and "Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas." (cc).

programme.title: The Bishop's Wife
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee about a clergyman whose prayers for divine guidance in his fund-raising efforts are answered in the form of a handsome, personable guardian angel who attempts to solve all his social and domestic problems. Remade in 1996 as "The Preacher's Wife." (cc).(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Faithful version of the Charles Dickens classic about miserly Ebenezer Scrooge who, after being visited by three ghosts on Christmas Eve, learns the meaning of the true spirit of the holiday. Reginald Owen took the role of Scrooge in place of an ailing Lionel Barrymore. Real-life husband and wife Gene and Kathleen Lockhart play Mr. and Mrs. Bob Cratchit, and their daughter June costars as a Cratchit daughter. (cc).(n)

programme.title: In the Good Old Summertime
programme.desc: Two clerks in a turn-of-the-20th-century Chicago sheet-music store are intensely antagonistic toward each other, but unbeknownst to the two, they actually are getting very chummy as pen pals. A musical remake of "The Shop Around the Corner," in which the setting was changed from a Budapest sundries shop. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Meet John Doe
programme.desc: Frank Capra's classic about a down-on-his-luck baseball player who agrees to impersonate a fictional, idealistic "everyman" created by a newspaperwoman to boost circulation, and then finds himself at the center of a political movement. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Desk Set
programme.desc: An efficiency expert shakes up a TV network's research department by installing a computer. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Love Finds Andy Hardy
programme.desc: Andy finds himself the target of a lot of female attention as he prepares for the country club Christmas party, to which he had originally wanted to bring his girlfriend, Polly, until she announced she'd be going out of town for the holidays. (cc).(n)

programme.title: 3 Godfathers
programme.desc: Three bandits on the run in the Arizona desert discover a dying woman and her baby, and promise the mother they'll see that the infant makes it to civilization. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Bundle of Joy
programme.desc: Musical remake of the 1939 comedy "Bachelor Mother" is about a department-store salesgirl whose life is turned upside-down when she finds an abandoned infant, and despite her protestations and denials, many assume she's the child's actual mother. Stars Eddie Fisher and Debbie Reynolds were married at the time. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Bachelor Mother
programme.desc: When a man mistakes a pretty, fun-loving department-store clerk for the mother of a foundling baby, he becomes determined to keep mom and child together, much to her dismay. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Fitzwilly
programme.desc: Dick Van Dyke as a butler who organizes his fellow servants into a gang of thieves to keep their mistress (Edith Evans) out of poverty. Barbara Feldon, John McGiver, Harry Townes. programme.title: The Man Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Broadway hit about an imperious, acid-tongued lecturer who, after being injured in a fall in front of an Ohio family's abode, becomes their surprise houseguest while he recovers, and proceeds to drive them crazy. (cc).(n)

programme.title: It Happened on Fifth Avenue
programme.desc: A vagabond moves into a New York City mansion while the owner is wintering down South and opens the doors to a number of unfortunates, including the vacationer's daughter, whom the squatter mistakes for a down-on-her-luck runaway from an abusive father.(n)

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz

programme.desc: Snoop and Method Man rock out to eighties hits, "Claws" star Karrueche Tran teaches about selfies, and Snoop reads fairy tales. A cheerleader and hip hop hipster square off for a chance to win $25,000. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: Pride faces backlash from the FBI after helping a former Navy intelligence analyst who is the prime suspect in a multiple-homicide case. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The murder of a decorated petty officer inside a sports arena leads the team to discover evidence linking the crime to the kidnapping of another petty officer who was last seen in Mexico. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: The team must rescue Sebastian after he's abducted from a restaurant and forced to orchestrate a prison break using his gaming skills. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team join forces with the FBI to investigate a plane crash in the bayou that left three sailors dead. Meanwhile, Sonja and Lasalle interview candidates for the open agent position. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: A Navy Seal candidate who was murdered just before his graduation leads the team to investigate unorthodox training exercises. Meanwhile, Wade asks Pride for advice after her adopted son announces his own plan to join the Navy. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: A coldhearted, unmarried businessman (Nicolas Cage) is magically transformed into a suburban working stiff with a wife and kids. Charming performances but schmaltzy. Tea Leoni. Brett Ratner directed. (cc).

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Set in London, this romantic comedy chronicles the affairs of several couples during Christmastime. There's also recent widower Daniel, trying to help his lonely stepson Sam express his true feelings to a classmate. Across town, devoted working mother Karen tries to rekindle the passion of her husband. (cc).

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy start-up fashion company, and unexpectedly becomes a confidant for the overwhelmed young CEO. (cc).

programme.desc: A powerful vision moves Phoebe to bring home an abandoned infant in order to protect him from a spirit bent on revenge. programme.title: Charmed

programme.desc: When Prue prevents a Darklighter from killing a potential Whitelighter, she becomes the target for his anger. programme.title: MacGruber

programme.title: Mike Judge Presents: Tales From the Tour Bus
programme.desc: Season 2 premiere. programme.title: Mike Judge Presents: Tales From the Tour Bus

programme.title: Cruising with Jane McDonald
programme.desc: A Lilliputian lope round the Inner Hebrides puts Jane in touch with her Scottish roots, as alongside just six other passengers the singer embarks on what is easily her smallest ever cruise. Jane enjoys unseasonably cloudless skies and sparkling seas as the route takes in the puffin-packed Treshnish Islands and Fingal's Cave on Staffa, the mythic rock formation that famously inspired Mendelssohn's Hebrides Overture. The excursion is rounded off with some traditional trappings, from ceilidhs and weaving to haggis-making.

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.

programme.title: Mobmania
programme.desc: Program o nowinkach technicznych. Autorzy przedstawiają najnowsze gadżety, smartfony itp.

programme.title: Będę grał w grę
programme.desc: Magazyn skierowany do miłośników gier komputerowych. Jego autorzy omawiają i testują najnowsze propozycje, które trafiają na rynek.

programme.title: Weekend z Eską TV
programme.desc: Autorzy programu zabierają widzów do najciekawszych miejsc w Polsce. Przeprowadzają wywiady, pokazują kulisy swojej pracy, relacjonują wydarzenia, którym towarzyszyły kamery Eski TV.

programme.title: Weekend z Eską TV
programme.desc: Autorzy programu zabierają widzów do najciekawszych miejsc w Polsce. Przeprowadzają wywiady, pokazują kulisy swojej pracy, relacjonują wydarzenia, którym towarzyszyły kamery Eski TV.

programme.title: Miejska lista
programme.desc: Prowadząca program, Ola, odwiedza polskie miasta i zachęca ludzi, by wybierali klipy, które chcieliby usłyszeć.

programme.title: Jazdy Gwiazdy
programme.desc: Gospodarz programu Filip "Rudy" Rudanacja zaprasza do swojego garbusa znane i lubiane gwiazdy show-biznesu. Podczas wspólnej przejażdżki nie zawaha się zapytać swojego gościa o wszystko, na co ma ochotę i co chcieliby usłyszeć widzowie.

programme.title: Co się słucha?
programme.desc: Prowadzący sprawdzają, czego słuchają przypadkowo spotkani na ulicy ludzie.

programme.title: The best of ESKA
programme.desc: W magazynie prezentowane są najlepsze fragmenty programu radia Eska.

programme.title: Nagrywarka
programme.desc: Program, w którym widzowie przesyłają pozdrowienia. Wystarczy, że odnajdą specjalne pudełko i zostawią w nim swoje nagranie. Prowadzący Filip z przemierzy z "nagrywarką" całą Polskę, zawita zarówno do dużych, jak i mniejszych miast. Uczestnicy programu oprócz możliwości nagrania pozdrowień, będą mogli wziąć udział w specjalnych quizach i wygrać nagrody pieniężne.

programme.title: Podwójna Gorąca 20
programme.desc: Lista czterdziestu najgorętszych hitów w Polsce. Widzowie usłyszą najpopularniejsze aktualnie przeboje.

programme.title: Podwójna Gorąca 20
programme.desc: Lista czterdziestu najgorętszych hitów w Polsce. Widzowie usłyszą najpopularniejsze aktualnie przeboje.

programme.title: Podwójna Gorąca 20

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV.

programme.title: Nagrywarka
programme.desc: Program, w którym widzowie przesyłają pozdrowienia. Wystarczy, że odnajdą specjalne pudełko i zostawią w nim swoje nagranie. Prowadzący Filip z przemierzy z "nagrywarką" całą Polskę, zawita zarówno do dużych, jak i mniejszych miast. Uczestnicy programu oprócz możliwości nagrania pozdrowień, będą mogli wziąć udział w specjalnych quizach i wygrać nagrody pieniężne.(n)

programme.title: Jazdy Gwiazdy
programme.desc: Gospodarz programu Filip "Rudy" Rudanacja zaprasza do swojego garbusa znane i lubiane gwiazdy show-biznesu. Podczas wspólnej przejażdżki nie zawaha się zapytać swojego gościa o wszystko, na co ma ochotę i co chcieliby usłyszeć widzowie.(n)

programme.title: 10 hitów 1 po 2

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Lovable blue gnomes---only three apples high---live an idyllic existence in a medieval forest, though their happiness is threatened by the wicked wizard Gargamel. `The Smurfs' can be traced back to 1958, when Belgian cartoonist Pierre `Peyo' Culliford created the mushroom-dwelling creatures. They debuted on American toy shelves in the late-1970s before appearing on NBC's Saturday-morning schedule. The show was a huge success, expanding from an hour to 90 minutes in 1982 and garnering two Emmys. (cc).

programme.title: The Jetsons
programme.desc: Hanna-Barbera's space-age counterpoint to their `Flintstones,' featuring George Jetson, wife Jane and their kids, Elroy and Judy. `The Jetsons' was memorable for (apart from a nifty theme song) goofy futuristic gadgets, such as a robot maid and a car that turned into a briefcase. It aired for one season in prime time on ABC, but those episodes were repeated on Saturday mornings on three networks off and on over the next 20 years. More episodes were produced for syndication in the 1980s.(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Rock-solid animated sitcom about a Stone Age family in the prehistoric town of Bedrock that played out like a cartoon version of `The Honeymooners.' The series, originally titled `The Flagstones,' was TV's first prime-time cartoon. It later thrived in syndication and spawned many incarnations, including `The Flintstone Kids' (which cast Fred, Wilma, Barney and Betty as 10-year-olds), specials (such as a 1993 one in which Pebbles married Bamm Bamm) and theatrical films (in 1994 and 2000).(n)

programme.title: Millie Inbetween
programme.desc: When Mum is made redundant from her job at Sunnyshopper, the family is supportive - until she starts a regime of frenzied over-tidying. programme.title: Millie Inbetween

Meanwhile, Mum has problems of her own when she decides slacker Craig needs a hobby.

programme.title: Millie Inbetween
programme.desc: Dad and Amber are back together - and Amber's moving in. It's only temporary, until they find a bigger place, but the resulting chaos drives Millie, Lauren, Fran and Jake round to Mum's. And Millie has an ulterior motive: getting Craig to look after the hyper Jake as revenge for his annoying behaviour. She thinks it'll teach him to be a better brother - but Jake thinks Craig is pretty cool as he is, and starts imitating his teenage ways. Back in the confusion of the crowded flat, Dad's new website is bringing in lots of work, but his Post-It based filing system has a major weakness: gusts of wind.

Big Bird realises he's forgotten to tell Santa that he's staying at The Furchester Hotel for Christmas and is worried that Santa won't know where to deliver his presents. Elmo and the other guests haven't told Santa either and become really worried. Will Santa know where to deliver their presents? It's too late to get a letter to the North Pole, so the Furchesters try to distract all the guests with their Christmas activities. However, every mention of Santa makes everyone worried again, they don't finish any of the activities they started. And Phoebe is disappointed that she can't enjoy her Christmas the way the Furchesters planned it. Shrek settles down for a quiet Christmas with Fiona and the babies, but Donkey and the ogre's other friends have their own ideas - and the party soon descends into chaos. Featuring the voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz and Antonio Banderas.

Animated mystery adventure, with the voice of Matthew Lillard.
